Author: RosieNP
Text: Most bulimics start with anorexic behavior and then start purging. I'd keep in mind that over time, most bulimics gain weight, not lose it. It starts with purging small meals, then becomes binging... It's addictive, literally, because it released endogenous opioid in your brain. It's a very difficult habit to stop, so you're right to want to nip it in the bud early.
